con:config.script:
import org.openqa.selenium.By import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedConditions; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Wait; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.WebDriverWait; //System.setProperty("webdriver.gecko.driver", "E:\\Automation\\UI\\drivers\\geckodriver.exe") System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "C:\\drivers\\chromedriver.exe") //WebDriver driver = new FirefoxDriver() WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver() driver.get("https://redrivergloalamo.b2clogin.com/redrivergloalamo.onmicrosoft.com/oauth2/v2.0/authorize?p=B2C_1_ALAMO_PROTOTYPE_SIGNIN_SIGNUP&client_id=e985fe72-999e-40c7-b36b-2dbe6d966b6c&nonce=defaultNonce&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fjwt.ms&scope=openid%20https%3A%2F%2Fredrivergloalamo.onmicrosoft.com%2Fe985fe72-999e-40c7-b36b-2dbe6d966b6c%2Fcustomers.read&response_type=id_token%20token&prompt=login") // Url to be opened log.info driver.getSessionId().toString() Thread.sleep(10000)
WebDriverWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver,5) wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.id("logonIdentifier"))) driver.findElement(By.id("logonIdentifier")).sendKeys("yan.liu@an-chen.com")
wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.id("password"))) driver.findElement(By.id("password")).sendKeys("Lychan@2012")
wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.xpath("//button[@id='next']"))) driver.findElement(By.xpath("//button[@id='next']")).click()
Thread.sleep(20000) wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtHeader']"))) jwtHeader = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtHeader']")).getText() log.info(jwtHeader)
jwtClaims = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtClaims']")).getText() log.info(jwtClaims)
jwtSignature = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtSignature']")).getText() log.info(jwtSignature)
token = 'Bearer '+ jwtHeader+'.'+jwtClaims+'.'+jwtSignature log.info(token) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Authorization",token) driver.close() driver.quit()

con:configuration.scriptText: log.info messageExchange.getResponseHeaders() location = messageExchange.getResponseHeaders().get("Location")[0].toString() b=location.length()-36 log.info(b) c=location.substring(location.length()-36,location.length()) log.info(c) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("customerId",location.substring(location.length()-36,location.length())); context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("entityId",location.substring(location.length()-36,location.length()));

con:config.script:
import org.openqa.selenium.By import org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement import org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxDriver import org.openqa.selenium.chrome.ChromeDriver
import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedCondition; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.ExpectedConditions; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.Wait; import org.openqa.selenium.support.ui.WebDriverWait; //System.setProperty("webdriver.gecko.driver", "E:\\Automation\\UI\\drivers\\geckodriver.exe") System.setProperty("webdriver.chrome.driver", "C:\\drivers\\chromedriver.exe") //WebDriver driver = new FirefoxDriver() WebDriver driver = new ChromeDriver() driver.get("https://redrivergloalamo.b2clogin.com/redrivergloalamo.onmicrosoft.com/oauth2/v2.0/authorize?p=B2C_1_ALAMO_PROTOTYPE_SIGNIN_SIGNUP&client_id=e985fe72-999e-40c7-b36b-2dbe6d966b6c&nonce=defaultNonce&redirect_uri=https%3A%2F%2Fjwt.ms&scope=openid%20https%3A%2F%2Fredrivergloalamo.onmicrosoft.com%2Fe985fe72-999e-40c7-b36b-2dbe6d966b6c%2Fcustomers.read&response_type=id_token%20token&prompt=login") // Url to be opened log.info driver.getSessionId().toString() Thread.sleep(10000)
WebDriverWait wait = new WebDriverWait(driver,5) wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.id("logonIdentifier"))) driver.findElement(By.id("logonIdentifier")).sendKeys("yan.liu@an-chen.com")
wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.id("password"))) driver.findElement(By.id("password")).sendKeys("Lychan@2012")
wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.xpath("//button[@id='next']"))) driver.findElement(By.xpath("//button[@id='next']")).click()
Thread.sleep(20000) wait.until(ExpectedConditions.presenceOfElementLocated(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtHeader']"))) jwtHeader = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtHeader']")).getText() log.info(jwtHeader)
jwtClaims = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtClaims']")).getText() log.info(jwtClaims)
jwtSignature = driver.findElement(By.xpath("//div[@id='encodedToken']/span[@class='jwtSignature']")).getText() log.info(jwtSignature)
token = 'Bearer '+ jwtHeader+'.'+jwtClaims+'.'+jwtSignature log.info(token) context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("Authorization",token) driver.close() driver.quit()
